actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for corrections in the enrollment of S. 2718, Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1975.

summary.text: Corrects the enrollment of S. 2718, a bill to improve the quality of rail services in the United States through regulatory reform, coordination of rail services and facilities, and rehabilitation and improvement financing.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for corrections in the enrollment of S. 2718, Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1975.
